title: World Food Championships
overview: Hosted in Las Vegas, The World Food Championships is one of the most ambitious and authentic food competitions held annually. This series follows talented home cooks and professional chefs from across America as they compete to create dishes mouth-wateringly creative enough to win their food category. From BBQ, to bacon to family recipes - there is a winner for each competition, culminating in a grand finale with a shot at winning a $50,000 prize.
